name: Dino'N GAS ~[BOOTLEG] ~
description:
ZQSD/left stick=> move
Space bar/ A button => hit and shoot
Controller ready

Remember when you were a kid and played with your toys?
There is just that! Shoot away your t rex toys with your handy nerf gun!

This game is the first of our BOOTLEG serie, games we did quicker than our usual productions!
The more bootlegs we make, the more time we can put in a bigger, more polished project!
See you next week!
